Text: RE ERCOT Retail Transition to Open Market Meeting Cc This is a follow up reminder about the ERCOT Retail Transition to Open Market Meeting for tomorrow November at ERCOT If you havent RSVPd for this meeting and plan to come please reply to this email to confirm your spot Space is still available for this meeting Terri Waggoner desk fax Original Message From Bergman Karen Sent Wednesday November PM To Texas Test Plan Team Standard Electronic Transactions Retail Pilot RMS and othersRetail Market Sub Cc ERCOT SCS Leads Hailu Ted Bojorquez William Bill Jones Sam Noel Tom Tindall Heather Waggoner Terri Broadrick Cherie Hetrick Nancy Patel Roshni Morales Rita ERCOT Client Service Reps Registration Subject ERCOT Retail Transition to Open Market Meeting Importance High Subject ERCOT Retail Transition to Open Market Date Tuesday November Time am pm Lunch will be provided Location ERCOT Met Center directions AboutERCOTDrivingDirectionshtm ERCOT is hosting this meeting to provide an orientation to the Competitive Retailers about what will transpire between now and January for the Texas Retail Market Included in the presentation will be an overview of the migration to production the switching process the ERCOT portal as well as communicating with ERCOT Please review the attached agenda for the full list of items that will be covered File Retail Market Transition to Open Marketdoc This meeting is open to all CRs but will focus on topics to help the new CRs in making the transition Attendance is limited to people Please RSVP to Terri Waggoner by Tuesday November th Enclosed is a progress report towards the transition to the full retail market operation The first attached file was used at a presentation made to the ERCOT Technical Advisory Committee TAC on Thursday November The presentation contains the status of switch requests submitted by Competitive Retailers CRs as of that date It also presents key retail market milestones on a timeline for the transition to full market operations on January A second file detailing the Texas SET version migration plan approved by the Retail Market Subcommittee RMS is also attached File Transition Updatezip If you have questions please contact Karen Bergman at or Ted Hailu at Thank you Karen Bergman Senior Client Services Representative ERCOT ps I apologize if you received this email more than once
